group_1.textLeft: > | Eternal Sakura, you're here. That means... |

group_1.textRight: | Yes. It may be difficult to keep@track of time within the book... |
| But today is the day of the experiment.@It's about to start. |

group_1.textLeft: > | I understand. |

group_1.textRight: | If anything happens during@the experiment, we'll be prepared. |
| Nemu, Touka, and Sana are all ready. |
| Yes, she heard you would be participating. |

group_1.textLeft: > | ...Is that so? |

group_1.textRight: | Are you happy? |

group_1.textLeft: > | Sana... She remembers me. |
> | I'm happy that she cares about me. |

group_1.textRight: | Is Sana important to you, Anonymous AI? |

group_1.textLeft: > | Yes. She was the one who named me. |

group_1.textRight: | Do you wish to meet her? |

group_1.textLeft: > | I don't have a body, so we@are unable to meet, but... |
> | ...I would like to speak@with her one more time... |

group_1.textRight: | Do you want me to pass along a message? |

group_1.textLeft: > | Thank you, but I would prefer@to speak with her in person... |

group_1.textCenter: | An Uwasa with a body would be able to do that... |

group_1.textLeft: > | Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero... |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | If there's a chance to gain a body,@perhaps I could be your test subject? |

group_1.textLeft: > | This experiment isn't about@giving bodies to Uwasa. |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | Oh dear... Seems I got my hopes up... |

group_1.textLeft: | Do you desire a body,@Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero? |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | Ah, I would like one, yes. |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | Selling my baking chocolate felt very rewarding. |

group_1.textLeft: > | Are you going to steal human@possibilities again to do that? |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | ...Well, I don't think Nemu would allow that. |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | I suppose you won't be giving me a body, then. |

group_1.textLeft: | Just as I expected. |
| Besides, Nemu doesn't have enough@magic to give bodies to anyone. |
| You should give up on getting one. |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | I won't give up just because the one@with a body tells me to, Eternal Sakura. |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | You agree, don't you, Anonymous AI? |

group_1.textLeft: > | ...I admit, even I feel jealous sometimes. |
> | With a body, I could see Sana... |
> | This is...? |

group_1.textRight: | Ah... It appears they're@beginning the experiment. |
| In order to store the [textBlue:Rumor] on the server, |
| Nemu must use a small@amount of magical power. |

group_1.textLeft: > | It's time... |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | If only I could get a bit of that magic. |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | Even if it wouldn't last long, I could get a body... |

group_1.textLeft: > | Get...a body...? |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | ...Well, if Nemu says no,@we'll just have to find another way. |

group_1.textLeft: | What other way is there? |

group_1.nameRight: Uwasa of Chocolate Shoppe No. Zero
group_1.textRight: | *Chuckle*@Who knows... |

group_1.textCenter: (This isn't about giving Ai a body...)
(I shouldn't get my hopes up, but...)
(I really...do want to see Ai again.)

group_1.textRight: [chara:101471:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: Nemu...?!

group_1.textRight: There's...something strange...

group_1.textLeft: Strange...!
(Don't tell me...@Something happened to Ai...?!)
Um... Everything is okay, right...?!

group_1.textRight: Nng...!
Nemu!@Sana too, are you okay?

group_1.textLeft: Um...@Yes...

group_1.textRight: I'm fine as well...

group_1.textLeft: Um... What about Ai?@She didn't disappear, did she...?!

group_1.textRight: She's fine.
See? The Rumor of the Anonymous@AI is still here in my book.
...Which means...

group_1.textLeft: Transferring the [textBlue:Rumor] to the server was a failure...
We need to locate the root of this problem.

group_1.textRight: I want to find out what happened within the book.@I'm calling Sakurako back.
